body {
  color: #333;
  font-family: "Nanum Gothic", sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 1.4;
}

  display: block;
}

header .inner {
  position: relative;
  width: 1100px;
  height: 120px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  background-color: orange;
}

header .logo {
  height: 75px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  margin: auto;
}

  font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
  display: flex;
}

  position: relative;
}

  content: "";
  /* display: block; */
  width: 1px;
  height: 12px;
  background-color: #e5e5e5;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  margin: auto;
}

/* ì²«ë²ˆì§¸ ì„œë¸Œë©”ë‰´ì˜ êµ¬ë¶„ì„ ì„ ì œê±°í•œë‹¤. */

  display: none;

  display: block;
  font-size: 12px;
  padding: 11px 16px;
  color: #656565;
}

header .sub-menu ul.menu li a:hover {
  color: #000;
}

4. ì†Œê°
